title: The Haunter of the Dark: The H.P. Lovecraft Omnibus, #3
description: WARNING! YOU ARE ABOUT TO ENTER A NEW DIMENSION OF UTMOST TERRORWhen you open this book you will lost - lost in a world of dreadful nightmare brought to screaming life by the century's greatest master of adult fantasy and horror.H.P. LovecraftHere is a collection of the most famous stories of this master of tomb-dark fear:The Rats In The Walls, The Call Of Cthulhu, The Haunter Of The Dark, Pickman's Model, The Lurking Fearplus other tales designed to haunt your dreams and bring you to sweat-soaked wakefulness in the darkest reaches of the night...Cover illustration by Tim White.
author: H.P. Lovecraft
